title: Download failures after patch 7.15
body: After patch 7.15 dropped i could no longer download league of legends. After 85% it says it fails and it doesn't know why. I've tried many times only to have it fail again and again. Any suggestions or help? Thanks.

replies.body: Your patcher is probably trying to apply an update to a certain file that could be damaged, which is causing the client to crash since it can't properly apply the patch. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and try running a quick **force repatch** and let me know how that works.
